application-form-type.legend: How would you like to apply?

new-application.label: A new application
new-application.hint: You will need a controlled drug activity user list to upload later

continue-an-application.label: Continue an application
continue-an-application.hint: An incomplete application stays on the system for 5 days and is then deleted

licensee-type.legend: What type of licensee are you?

existing-licensee-renew-or-change-site.label: Existing licensee renewing or changing a currently licensed site

existing-licensee-applying-for-new-site.label: Existing licensee applying for a new site

company-number.label: Company number (optional)
company-number.hint: Enter the  number issued by Companies House

is-premises-address-same.legend: Is the premises address the same as the licence holder address?

atleast-50-percent-from-public-fund.label: At least 50% from public funds, charitable or voluntary subscriptions

person-in-charge-confirmed-dbs.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

person-in-charge-dbs-fullname.label: Full name
person-in-charge-dbs-fullname.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

person-in-charge-dbs-subscription.legend: Has the managing director or person in charge subscribed to DBS updates?

member-of-professional-body.legend: Are they, or anyone named on this application, a member of a professional body?

professional-body-details.label: Provide details of the professional bodies and relevant reference numbers
professional-body-details.hint: For example, General Medical Council and GMC reference number

legal-business-proceedings.legend: Has anyone in your organisation ever been subject to legal business proceedings?
legal-business-proceedings.hint: This includes members of the board and senior management teams. Legal proceedings includes administrative, financial or bankruptcy cases

has-anyone-received-criminal-conviction.legend: Has anyone in your organisation ever received a criminal conviction?
has-anyone-received-criminal-conviction.hint: This includes members of the board and senior management teams. Conviction means UK and overseas convictions.

legal-proceedings-details.label: Provide details of the legal business proceedings

responsible-for-security.legend: Who is responsible for the security of the premises?

same-as-managing-director.label: The same person as the managing director
same-as-managing-director.hint: Re-use their contact and DBS information

person-responsible-for-security-confirme.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

person-responsible-for-security-dbs-full.label: Full name
person-responsible-for-security-dbs-full.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

person-responsible-for-security-dbs-subs.legend: Has the person responsible for the security of the premises subscribed to DBS updates?
